speedrunigt.title: SpeedRunIGT
speedrunigt.option.timer_position.descri: §eClick on a position to change the timer position.
You can finely adjust the position by pressing §eCtrl + arrow key.
speedrunigt.option.timer_position.show_d: Note: This option only applies when you aren't paused.
speedrunigt.option.timer_category.warnin: There are several unsupported categories, which will be added later.
speedrunigt.option.waiting_first_input.d:
Change the timer's starting point from
the world load to the player's first input
(movement, inventory, etc.).
This option is for categories that start on first input.
speedrunigt.option.auto_toggle_coop.desc:
When join or player joined on the server,
the timer automatically switches to co-op mode
and the timer is shared between players.
speedrunigt.option.start_old_worlds.desc:
If doesn't have previous timer data when
joined the old world, new timer will be start.
for the Perfect Seed category.
speedrunigt.option.global_options.descri:
If enable this option,
will be save the timer settings to a global folder.
otherwise, save to instance folder.
Current Path: %s
speedrunigt.option.limitless_reset.descr:
When using a custom category timer,
whether the timer can be reset only once(Off) or limitless(On).
speedrunigt.option.legacy_igt_mode.descr: Counting IGT by player's tick in statistics. It is same method as LiveSplit.
speedrunigt.option.auto_save_interval.de:
Set the interval to automatically save timer data.
This is a different option than the original timer data save.
Depending on the settings, probably cause little lags on low devices.
speedrunigt.option.timer_start_type.desc:
Set a when to start the timer.
- Automatic : If random seed, it works as a World Render.
   if set seed, it works as a First Input.
- First Input : Start at first input (key press, mouse movement)
- World Render : Start at first world render
speedrunigt.option.auto_retime.descripti:
Any%% runs which are sub-13 in 1.16+, sub-20 in 1.9-1.15, and sub-23 in pre1.9
will auto retimed by SRC retime rules.
If you are playing set seed or not Any%%, it will be disabled it.
speedrunigt.message.update.unknown: Failed to get latest version of information.
speedrunigt.message.update.updated: You are using the latest version.
speedrunigt.message.update.outdated: A new version has been found.
speedrunigt.message.update_found: A new version of SpeedRunIGT has been found! Check the 'SpeedRunIGT Info'
speedrunigt.message.reload_options: Do you want to reload the Speedrun options?
speedrunigt.message.delete_timer_cache: Are you sure you want to delete all saved world's timer data? (not includes options, etc.)
speedrunigt.message.click_delete_button_: If you click this button once again, it will be deleted.
speedrunigt.message.is_fsg.description: If you are using FSG seeds, enable it.
speedrunigt.split.title: Personal Records
